org.apache.struts2.jasper.runtime

Class PerThreadTagHandlerPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts2.jasper.runtime.TagHandlerPool
      • org.apache.struts2.jasper.runtime.PerThreadTagHandlerPool

  • public class PerThreadTagHandlerPool
extends TagHandlerPool
    Thread-local based pool of tag handlers that can be reused.
    Author:
    Jan Luehe, Costin Manolache

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.struts2.jasper.runtime.TagHandlerPool

        annotationProcessor, OPTION_MAXSIZE, OPTION_TAGPOOL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PerThreadTagHandlerPool()
      Constructs a tag handler pool with the default capacity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag get(Class handlerClass)
      Gets the next available tag handler from this tag handler pool, instantiating one if this tag handler pool is empty.
      protected void init(javax.servlet.ServletConfig config) 
      void release()
      Calls the release() method of all tag handlers in this tag handler pool.
      void reuse(javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag handler)
      Adds the given tag handler to this tag handler pool, unless this tag handler pool has already reached its capacity, in which case the tag handler's release() method is called.

      • Methods inherited from class org.apache.struts2.jasper.runtime.TagHandlerPool

        getOption, getTagHandlerPool

      • reuse

        public void reuse(javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag handler)
        Adds the given tag handler to this tag handler pool, unless this tag handler pool has already reached its capacity, in which case the tag handler's release() method is called.
        Overrides:
        reuse in class TagHandlerPool
        Parameters:
        handler - Tag handler to add to this tag handler pool

        Calls the release() method of all tag handlers in this tag handler pool.
